QUALITY ENGINEER.title: QUALITY ENGINEER
QUALITY ENGINEER.description: Tasked with putting the conference on paper. They will be responsible for creating documents that will be informative for the members, companies, and participants.
requirements: Proficient with Microsoft Word, Excel, and Powerpoint
Proficient with Google Platform (Forms, sheets, doc)

OPERATIONS ENGINEER.title: OPERATIONS ENGINEER
OPERATIONS ENGINEER.description: Tasked with puzzling all the pieces together. They will be grouping the hard work of all the sub-teams into 3 days. From writing a detailed and top-level schedule to finding the perfect venue, they will be making sure the event goes as smoothly as possible.
requirements: Proficient with Microsoft Word, Excel, and Powerpoint
Proficient with Google Platform (Forms, sheets, doc)

OUTREACH.title: OUTREACH
OUTREACH.description: Tasked with contacting companies to sponsor and attend the conference. They will be one of the points of contact between UCI Engineering Conference and companies.

CHAIRS.title: CHAIRS
CHAIRS.description: Tasked with developing a project that challenges conference participants to use their knowledge related to their field of study. Chairs create topics that rely heavily on the principles of system design. Chairs must be willing to learn how to speak in front of and train other students. Chairs will prepare a model project for conference participants and must be able to stimulate their interest in their engineering discipline through mentorship, leadership, and passion.
requirements: Proficient in Microsoft Office and Google Platform

SPECIAL PROJECTS.title: SPECIAL PROJECTS
SPECIAL PROJECTS.description: Tasked with contacting clubs/organizations for performance events during the conference. They will create design challenges along with a detailed schedule and cost for it.
requirements: Proficient with Google Platform (Forms, sheets, doc)

VIDEOGRAPHER / PHOTOGRAPHY / SOCIAL MEDI.title: VIDEOGRAPHER / PHOTOGRAPHY / SOCIAL MEDIA
VIDEOGRAPHER / PHOTOGRAPHY / SOCIAL MEDI.description: Tasked with creating social media posts, making them active and not passive. Responsible for keeping all social media platforms up to date and knowing how to work all the platforms.
requirements: Proficient with Google Platform (Forms, sheets, doc)

GRAPHIC DESIGNER.title: GRAPHIC DESIGNER
GRAPHIC DESIGNER.description: Tasked with creating all graphic designs for all physical and digital objects. Providing templates and accurate forms of where the graphic designs will be placed.
requirements: Proficient with Google Platform (Forms, sheets, doc)

WEB DEVELOPER.title: WEB DEVELOPER
WEB DEVELOPER.description: Tasked with developing the UCI Engineering Conference website and keeping it up to date with all events, pictures, etc. Provide maintenance to the backend.
requirements: Proficient with Google Platform (Forms, sheets, doc)
